Package org.variantsync.diffdetective.analysis

Record Class HistoryAnalysis

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Record
org.variantsync.diffdetective.analysis.HistoryAnalysis
Record Components:
repositoriesToAnalyze - The repositories whose commit history should be analyzed.
outputDir - The directory to which any produced results should be written.
commitsToProcessPerThread - Number of commits that should be processed by each single thread if multithreading is used. Each thread will be given this number of commits to process. A larger number means fewer threads and less scheduling. A smaller number means more threads but also more scheduling.
whatToDo - A factory for tasks that should be executed for the commits of a certain repository.
postProcessingOnRepositoryOutputDir - A callback that is invoked after all analyses are completed. The argument is the output directory on which postprocessing might occur.
public record HistoryAnalysis(List<Repository> repositoriesToAnalyze, Path outputDir, int commitsToProcessPerThread, CommitHistoryAnalysisTaskFactory whatToDo, Consumer<Path> postProcessingOnRepositoryOutputDir) extends Record
An analyses that is performed for the entire commit histories of each given git repository.
Author:
Paul Bittner

  • Method Details

    • analyze

      @Deprecated public static void analyze​(Repository repo, Path outputDir, DiffTreeLineGraphExportOptions exportOptions, AnalysisStrategy strategy)
      Deprecated.

    • analyzeAsync

      public static void analyzeAsync​(Repository repo, Path outputDir, CommitHistoryAnalysisTaskFactory taskFactory, int commitsToProcessPerThread)
      Static analysis method that can be used without creating an HistoryAnalysis object first. Analyzes the history of the given repository with the given parameters.
      Parameters:
      repo - The repository to analyze.
      outputDir - The directory to which any produced results should be written.
      taskFactory - A factory for tasks that should be executed for the commits of a certain repository.
      commitsToProcessPerThread - Number of commits that should be processed by each single thread if multithreading is used.

    • exportMetadata

      public static <T> void exportMetadata​(Path outputDir, Metadata<T> metadata)
      Exports the given metadata object to a file named according TOTAL_RESULTS_FILE_NAME in the given directory.
      Type Parameters:
      T - Type of the metadata.
      Parameters:
      outputDir - The directory into which the metadata object file should be written.
      metadata - The metadata to serialize

    • exportMetadataToFile

      public static <T> void exportMetadataToFile​(Path outputFile, Metadata<T> metadata)
      Exports the given metadata object to the given file. Overwrites existing files.
      Type Parameters:
      T - Type of the metadata.
      Parameters:
      outputFile - The file to write.
      metadata - The metadata to serialize

    • runAsync

      public void runAsync()
      Runs this analysis asynchronously. Processes each repository sequentially and runs analyzeAsync(Repository, Path, CommitHistoryAnalysisTaskFactory, int) on each of them.
